Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.controller

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.controller.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionsRMI, Serializable, Remote
public class VirtualView extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ActionsRMI
The VirtualView, it is instantiated in ServerConnection and assigned to a ClientHandler All request from both RMI and TCP pass from the linked instance of this class. RMI: client calls directly method implementation of ActionsRMI TCP: the request arrived to the ClientHandlerTCP is executed by the linked VirtualView
See Also:

      Throws:

    • broadcast

      private void broadcast(JsonMessage<BaseResponseData> response)
      Method called at last step of every execution. If the response is correct and the Client is in a Game the response is broadcast to every other user in the game. The list of client is retrieved from the GameController
      Parameters:
      response - the Response to send to the client's.

    • specificBroadcast

      private void specificBroadcast(JsonMessage<BaseResponseData> response, int clientIdToBroadcast)
      Method to broadcast to specific client
      Parameters:
      response - the Response to send to the client.
